(In reply to comment #2)
> Please attach log set file used to reproduce the problem.
> 

Please ignore my last comment. I see the file already attached. THANKS.
Navid, can you look into this defect please once test pass 2 is complete? Alex will be working on another critical defect for AC for 4.3 i3.

Created an attachment (id=51967)
Patch

The problem was the fact that you had parsers specified in the log set that are not included in TPTP.  e.g: com.ibm.etools.logging.parsers.DB2DiagnosisLogParser and com.ibm.etools.logging.parsers.WASActivityLogParser.

I've modified the code such that it only shows up the log files with the parsers that exist in the workbench.  Log files that are associated with parsers that don't exist will not show up.

Eugene, could you please submit this patch? I don't have write access to Monitoring.

The modified plugin is org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.

Patch reviewed and submitted.

THANKS Navid.
